content.summary: This is my first test blog post for the Outreachy summer intership at Cadasta.
content.title: A first post for a first job

about.blurb:
*Hello World!* Welcome to my coding blog!
 I'm a fuzzy koala coder and here I write about my experience as an Outreachy intern at Cadasta.
 After studying politics and international developement, I decided to self-learn programming and I'm excited to share challenges, joys and lessons learnt along the way. My posts highlight the reality of studying and working on open source, remote and tech-for-good projects.
